title: Clear night city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a city street at night with multiple braking events.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to ensure safety during the nighttime drive. It slows down and brakes frequently to avoid potential risks and to follow traffic rules.
